job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pDenver Colorado preferredppOr RemoteppbrppWere committed to building a world where everyone everywhere has access to care that works A world where a better future for healthcare means leveraging the power of information and technologyand celebrating those who make change possiblenbspppnbspppTo get there were creating an environment where you have the support tools and resources that inspire the kind of groundbreaking thinking that will bring this vision to lifeppnbspppJoin us to create whats next for health a purposebuilt digital platform that drives 365 healthcare transformation by connecting the global health ecosystem to insights from peers and thought leaders professional development tools networking opportunities and curated content  anytime anywherenbspppnbspppstrongYour Challengestrong The Software Engineer builds software functionality and participates actively in the delivery team by taking on development responsibilities for the entire tech stack The Software Engineer works on a crossfunctional team and contributes across several other technical activities such as DevOps and quality of the product The Software Engineer collaborates closely with teammates across disciplines including DevOps quality product and design to drive positive business outcomes They will have a real passion for development and a demonstrated appetite for continual learning typically manifest in their community contributions eg open source work publishing  speaking on technical ideasppnbspppWhat you will need to be successfulppstrongThe things that you will tacklestrongpulliBuild applications ensuring that the code follows latest coding practices and industry standardsliliDesign and develop the business logic and backend systems as we scale through our MVP and beyondliliWork closely with team mates to build a quality system endtoendliliWrite unit integration tests and functional automationliliDevelop high quality well documented and efficient codeliliChallenge ideas and opinions to avoid pitfalls and inefficient solutionsliliBuild using modern design patterns and architectural principlesliliSupport product owner in defining future stories and tech lead in defining technical designsliulpstrongWhat you will need to be successfulstrongpulli0  3 years of experience with software developmentliliSeen as a keen learner within the technical components of the domainsproductsliliPassionate to learn new technologies and strives towards crossfunctional developmentliliExperience writing and utilizing autonomous services oriented RESTful API services and performance tuning large scale appsliliAbility to write effective unit integration and API testsliliExposure to HTML CSSLESSSCSSetc JavaScript and responsive designliliExperience in the JavaScript ecosystems such as React Node TypeScript etcliliIntermediate understanding of technical best practices to support Agile developmentliulpstrongWhat else will help you be successfulstrongpulliMobile development experience with either native or webtonative tooling and frameworksliliExperience with database systems with knowledge of SQL and NoSQL stores eg MySQL Oracle MongoDB Couchbase etcliulpbrppWhy we love our workplace and why you will toopulliFun collaborative and winning team environmentliliFlexible working arrangementsliliCompetitive pay and comprehensive healthcare coverageliliGenerous paid time off including time off to volunteerliliWellbeing programs to support all of your emotional physical and financial needsliliEmphasis on continuous learning and developmentliulpnbspppAre you a ChangemakerppWell do amazing things for healthcareppnbsppulliWe are an Equal Opportunity Employer VetsDisabledliul
